# Moderation Logging for OpenAuto Project

Ensure comprehensive moderation logging for the OpenAuto project, which is an open-source software that allows users to run Android Auto on their vehicles. This should address the following key areas:
1. Improving Logging and Monitoring
    - Enable easier tracing of issues
    - Allow easy debugging
    - Allow adjustment of logging levels
    - Ensure Logging uses a standard format which can be easily parsed
    - Ensure that the logging system is performant and does not introduce significant overhead
    - Ensure that the logging system is secure and does not expose sensitive information
    - Ensure the logging system is configurable and can be easily integrated with other systems
    - Ensure the logging system is well-documented and easy to use
    - Ensure the logging system is compatible with different platforms and environments
    - Ensure the logging system is scalable and can handle large volumes of data
    - Ensure the logging system is reliable and can recover from failures
    - Ensure the logging system is maintainable and can be easily updated
    - Ensure the logging system is extensible and can be easily customised
